TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SplitterEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for and the events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时用户正在移动控件。The event occurs when the user is moving the control. 事件发生时在用户完成移动控件。The event occurs when the user finishes moving the control. 类指定鼠标指针的位置和的左上角的位置控件。The class specifies the position of the mouse pointer and the position of the upper-left corner of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`SplitContainer1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#548](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#548)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#548](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#548)]

MemberSignature.Value: public SplitterEventArgs (int x, int y, int splitX, int splitY);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 x, int32 y, int32 splitX, int32 splitY) cil managed
Public Sub New (x As Integer, y As Integer, splitX As Integer, splitY As Integer)
public: SplitterEventArgs(int x, int y, int splitX, int splitY);

param.name: x
param.span: 鼠标指针的 x 坐标（在工作区坐标中）。

span.span: The x-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).

param.name: y
param.span: 鼠标指针的 y 坐标（在工作区坐标中）。

span.span: The y-coordinate of the mouse pointer (in client coordinates).

param.name: splitX
param.span: 左上角的 x 坐标（在工作区坐标中）。

span.span: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the (in client coordinates).

param.name: splitY
param.span: 左上角的 y 坐标（在工作区坐标中）。

span.span: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the (in client coordinates).

summary.span: 使用鼠标指针的指定坐标和 控件左上角的坐标初始化 类的实例。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class with the specified coordinates of the mouse pointer and the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public int SplitX { get; set; }
.property instance int32 SplitX
Public Property SplitX As Integer
public: property int SplitX { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 左上角的 x 坐标（在工作区坐标中）。

span.span: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the (in client coordinates).

value.span: 该控件左上角的 x 坐标。

span.span: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性连同的此类，以确定的位置属性控制和引发事件。You can use this property along with the property of this class to determine the position of the control when the and events are raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`SplitContainer1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#548](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#548)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#548](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#548)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性连同的此类，以确定鼠标指针的当前位置的属性时和引发事件。You can use this property along with the property of this class to determine the current location of the mouse pointer when the and events are raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`SplitContainer1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
